meanings.definition: A large, colorful fish found in tropical and temperate waters.
meanings.sent1: The opahs swam gracefully in the clear ocean.
meanings.sent2: We saw a school of opahs while snorkeling in Hawaii.
meanings.sent3: The opahs decided to have a colorful underwater party.
meanings.sent4: The opahs shimmered like rainbows in the sea.
meanings.sent5: The opahs' vibrant colors made them stand out among other fish.

meanings.definition: The plural form of 'opah', referring to more than one of these fish.
meanings.sent1: Look at all the opahs swimming together in the aquarium.
meanings.sent2: The fishermen caught several opahs during their trip.
meanings.sent3: The opahs gathered for a group photo under the sea.
meanings.sent4: The opahs danced in unison, creating a mesmerizing sight.
meanings.sent5: The opahs' presence added a burst of color to the ocean depths.
